attributes.action: Make all road users pay tax, including horse riders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We pay road tax, to pay for upkeep of the roads.
If this is the case then why dont horses, or more appropiately there owners have to pay road tax, as hooves, with shoes or not, but especially with shoes, clearly cause damage to the road, as the surface area of a foot pushing on the road is far smaller and more concentrated than a tyre on any vehicle.
This should include horses, and horses with carts, and hunts, as these are many horses using the road at once, this does cause damage, which we car tax payees pay for the repair of.
